text:
@GeraldoRivera @realDonaldTrump Gidday @GeraldoRivera
We in Australia don't understand how Americans keep supporting The President with  complete failed response to Covid19
I have only been following US politics for the Last 6 months.for America to be the leader's of the free world
Your democracy is in trouble
